content.text:
# King of Ceylon

King of Ceylon is a title that may refer to:
*the head of state of Ceylon from 1948 to 1952
**George VI, the only person to hold this position between 1948 and 1952; Elizabeth II was Queen of Ceylon from 1952 to 1972; see Monarchy of Ceylon (1948â€“1972)
*any king of Sri Lanka, see List of Sri Lankan monarchs
